mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Prison the Parish of St. Landry, on the 14th of March instant, a negro-man calling himself William, says he belongs to Mr. Chr√©tien, of the Parish of Landry. This boy is very black, spare built, aged about 30 years, has 5 feet, 8 inches high, speaks french and english. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, March 25th, 1854.
